tool_description: Amazon marketplace data REST API providing real time product, seller, review and ranking data.
name: sellytics
title: sellytics

api_list.name: Get a specific amazon product
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a well formatted amazon product as json. This document contains all product properties, price, buybox, product details and so on.

required_parameters.name: marketplace
required_parameters.description: The marketplace where the product should be obtained. Could be DE, US, UK, JP, ES, IT and so on.
